name: Danish Association of Cosmetics and Detergents
goal: The Danish Association of Cosmetics and Detergents represents the Cosmetics industry as well as the industry for soaps, detergents and maintenance products in Denmark. The association has more than 90 members operating in the danish market representing 9.000 employees and a annual revenue of more than 5 billion euro.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Environment, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Chemicals legislation REFIT (Reach, CLP), Detergents Regulation (648/2004) REFIT,  Evaluation, Packaging & Packaging Waste Directive (94/62/EC), Waste Framework Directive (2008/98/EC), Circular Economy Package, EU Plastic Strategy, Cosmetic Products Regulation and other related regulation, such as A European Green Deal.
